Want to join our Geospatial Community workshops?


We run monthly skill sharing tutorial sessions where a member of our community teaches us something they have learned along the way.

Fill out this form to join and get the workshop link:

Upcoming Workshop

Interactive Map with Python + Folium

May 18th, 3-5pm AEST on Teams

Dr Tony Howes (UQ, School of Chemical Engineering) will be sharing how Python and Folium (a wrapper for Python of the JavaScript Leaflet library) work together to create an interactive map.

The data will be from the Brisbane Dawn Nav, May 5th MapRun. Workshop materials will be in a Jupyter notebook and downloading Anaconda is recommended if you wish to follow along.
